get.description: 通过团队 Id 获取比赛 Writeup
get.summary: 通过团队 Id 获取比赛 Writeup

color.description: The category's theme color. (Such as Rainbow Dash's color is "#60AEE4")

icon.description: The category's icon. (Based on Material Design Icons, Reference site: https://pictogrammers.com/library/mdi/) (Such as "fingerprint": https://pictogrammers.com/library/mdi/icon/fingerprint/)

id.description: The category's id. As primary key.

cpu_limit.description: The challenge's CPU limit. (0 means no limit)

duration.description: The duration of container maintenance in the initial state. (Seconds)

id.description: The challenge's id. As primary key.

is_dynamic.description: Whether the challenge is based on dynamic container.

is_practicable.description: Whether the challenge is practicable. (Is the practice field visible.)

memory_limit.description: The challenge's memory limit. (0 means no limit)

practice_pts.description: The points will be given when the challenge is solved in practice field.

banned.description: Whether the flag is banned. If banned, the user who submitted the flag will be judged as cheating.

challenge.description: The challenge which the flag belongs to.

challenge_id.description: The challenge id. The flag belongs to.

env.description: The environment variable which is used to be injected with the flag.

value.description: The flag content. Maybe a string or a regex, or the placeholder for dynamic challenges. (Such as "flag{friendsh1p_1s_magic}" or "flag{[a-zA-Z]{5}}" or "flag{[UUID]}")

first_blood_reward_ratio.description: The prize ratio of first blood.

id.description: The game's id. As primary key.

is_need_write_up.description: Whether the game need write up.

second_blood_reward_ratio.description: The prize ratio of second blood.

third_blood_reward_ratio.description: The prize ratio of third blood.

challenge.description: The challenge which the hint belongs to.

challenge_id.description: The challenge which the hint belongs to.

published_at.description: When the hint will be published.

challenge.description: The JeopardyImage which the port belongs to.

challenge_id.description: The JeopardyImage which the port belongs to.

id.description: The port's id. As primary key.

challenge.description: The challenge which is related to this submission.

challenge_id.description: The challenge which is related to this submission.

flag.description: The flag which was submitted for judgement.

game.description: The game which is related to this submission.

game_challenge.description: The game_challenge which is related to this submission.

game_challenge_id.description: The game_challenge which is related to this submission.

game_id.description: The game which is related to this submission. (Must be set when TeamID is set)

id.description: The submission's id. As primary key.

status.description: The status of the submission. (0-meaningless, 1-accepted, 2-incorrect, 3-cheat, 4-invalid(duplicate, etc.))

team.description: The team which submitted the flag.

team_id.description: The team which submitted the flag. (Must be set when GameID is set)

user.description: The user who submitted the flag.

user_id.description: The user who submitted the flag.

id.description: The team's id. As primary key.
The user's id. As primary key.

username.description: The user's username. As a unique identifier.
